abilityEffect.en: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a [L] or [M] Energy attached to 1 of your Pokémon to another of your Pokémon. This power can't be used if Magnezone is affected by a Special Condition.

effect.en: Discard a [L] Energy and a [M] Energy attached to Magnezone. The Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
